CLEAN WATER: EUTROPHICATION

<!-- goal philosophy -->
<div class="content">
<h4 style="color:#051729;line-height:50px;font-weight:600;">
MINIMIZING POLLUTION BY (EXCESSIVE) NUTRIENTS
</h4>

<h5 style="font-size:23px">
This subgoal captures the degree to which waters are polluted by nutrients.
</h5>

<h5>
The Baltic Sea still suffers from eutrophication due to past and present excessive inputs of nitrogen and phosphorus.
</h5>

<br>
</div>


<!-- goal infographics -->

```{r include = FALSE, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 11) 

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

scores <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OHI-Baltic/bhi/master/index/scorelist.csv") %>% 
  filter(region_id == "BHI-000", year == 2020) %>% 
  select(dimension, goal, score)
```


<div class="rgncontainer">
<div class="rgnmap" style="background-color:#f2f4f5f7;width:49.5%;height:100%;padding:10px;">
```{r, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(filter(scores, goal == "EUT", dimension == "score")) +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = 100, ymin = 0, ymax = 100), fill = "#dbe4eb") +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = score, ymin = 0, ymax = score), fill = "#629ec1", color = NA) +
  geom_text(aes(x = score/2, y = score/2, label = round(score)), size = 65, color = "#f9fafb", family = "Impact") +
  theme_void() 
```
<br>
<br>
<p style="text-align:center">
The overall Baltic score average for Eutrophication
<br>
is 75 out of 100.
</p>

</div>

<div class="rgnmap" style="background-color:#f2f4f5f7;width:49.5%;height:100%;padding:10px;">
```{r, echo = FALSE}
scores %>% 
  filter(goal == "EUT", dimension %in% c("future", "score")) %>% 
  tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = "dimension",  values_from = "score") %>% 
  mutate(score_diff = (future-score)/score*100) %>% 
  mutate(score_diff = paste(ifelse(score_diff > 0, "+", ""), round(score_diff),  "%")) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = 100, ymin = 0, ymax = 100), fill = "#bcd1dfb3", color = NA) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 100)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100)) +
  geom_text(aes(x = 50, y = 50, label = score_diff), size = 65, color = "#629ec1", family = "Impact") +
  theme_void()
```
<br>
<br>
<p style="text-align:center">
It is estimated that in the near future the score for the Eutrophication subgoal will improve roughly +6%.
</p>

</div>
</div>

<!-- some text about the goal -->

<div class="content">
<h4 style="color:#051729;line-height:50px;font-weight:600;">
WHAT DOES THIS SCORE MEAN?
</h4>

Five indicators are combined in the eutrophication subgoal: offshore Secchi depth, summer chlorophyll-a concentration, oxygen debt and winter concentrations of dissolved inorganic phosphorus (DIP) and nitrogen (DIN).

A high score indicates that winter nutrient concentrations, summer Chlorophyll a concentrations, summer Secchi depth and annually averaged oxygen debt do not reach the threshold values of good environmental status, defined and used by HELCOM (2013, 2018).

Some of the assessment regions have more data points upon which to base the calculation. As a result, the statistical uncertainty of the scores can differ across regions.

<br>
</div>
